statements.select:
SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY AA.ID DESC) AS RowNo , AA.ID , AA.CreatedOn , AA.CreatedBy , AA.CreatedByName , AA.UpdatedOn , AA.UpdatedBy , AA.UpdatedByName
, AA.Name , AA.BizType , AA.BizNo , AA.RepName , AA.BizKind , AA.BizItem , AA.Status
, M1.Name as BizTypeName
FROM dbo.TBusiness AA WITH (NOLOCK) LEFT JOIN IKBase.dbo.TCode M1 WITH (NOLOCK) ON AA.BizType = M1.Code AND M1.ParentCode = 'BizType' WHERE 1=1
AND ( AA.Name LIKE '%' + #FindText# + '%' OR AA.BizNo LIKE '%' + #FindText# + '%' OR AA.RepName LIKE '%' + #FindText# + '%' OR AA.BizKind LIKE '%' + #FindText# + '%' OR AA.BizItem LIKE '%' + #FindText# + '%' )
AND AA.Status = #Status#
AND AA.BizType = #BizType#
ORDER BY RowNo
SELECT * FROM dbo.TBusiness AA WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE AA.ID = #ID#
statements.insert:
INSERT INTO dbo.TBusiness ( CreatedOn, CreatedBy, CreatedByName, Name, BizType, BizNo, RepName, BizKind, BizItem, AddressID, Status, Email, ImageID ) VALUES ( GetDate(), #CreatedBy#, #CreatedByName#, #Name#, #BizType#, #BizNo#, #RepName#, #BizKind#, #BizItem#, #AddressID#, #Status#, #Email#, #ImageID# )
SELECT @@IDENTITY AS ID
statements.update:
UPDATE dbo.TBusiness SET UpdatedOn = GetDate() , UpdatedBy = #UpdatedBy# , UpdatedByName = #UpdatedByName#
, Name = #Name# , BizType = #BizType# , BizNo = #BizNo# , RepName = #RepName# , BizKind = #BizKind# , BizItem = #BizItem# , Status = #Status# , AddressID = #AddressID# , Email = #Email# , ImageID = #ImageID# WHERE ID = #ID#
statements.select:
SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY AA.ID DESC) AS RowNo , AA.ID , AA.CreatedOn , AA.CreatedBy , AA.CreatedByName , AA.UpdatedOn , AA.UpdatedBy , AA.UpdatedByName
, AA.LinkType , AA.LinkID , AA.LinkName , AA.StartDate , AA.EndDate
FROM ( SELECT AA.ID , AA.CreatedOn , AA.CreatedBy , AA.CreatedByName , AA.UpdatedOn , AA.UpdatedBy , AA.UpdatedByName , 'Company' as LinkType , AA.CompanyID as LinkID , BB.Name as LinkName , AA.StartDate , AA.EndDate FROM dbo.TCompanyBusiness AA WITH (NOLOCK) INNER JOIN dbo.TCompany BB WITH (NOLOCK) ON AA.CompanyID = BB.ID WHERE AA.BusinessID = #BusinessID# UNION ALL SELECT AA.ID , AA.CreatedOn , AA.CreatedBy , AA.CreatedByName , AA.UpdatedOn , AA.UpdatedBy , AA.UpdatedByName , 'Customer' as LinkType , AA.CustomerID as LinkID , BB.Name as LinkName , AA.StartDate , AA.EndDate FROM dbo.TCustomerBusiness AA WITH (NOLOCK) INNER JOIN dbo.TCustomer BB WITH (NOLOCK) ON AA.CustomerID = BB.ID WHERE AA.BusinessID = #BusinessID# UNION ALL SELECT AA.ID , AA.CreatedOn , AA.CreatedBy , AA.CreatedByName , AA.UpdatedOn , AA.UpdatedBy , AA.UpdatedByName , 'Partner' as LinkType , AA.PartnerID as LinkID , BB.Name as LinkName , AA.StartDate , AA.EndDate FROM dbo.TPartnerBusiness AA WITH (NOLOCK) INNER JOIN dbo.TPartner BB WITH (NOLOCK) ON AA.PartnerID = BB.ID WHERE AA.BusinessID = #BusinessID# ) AA WHERE 1=1 ORDER BY RowNo
